transcript.title: Royal Wedding
transcript.content:
Prime Minister Julia Gillard and her partner Tim Mathieson will attend the wedding of His Royal Highness Prince William of Wales and Catherine Middleton next month.

The Prime Minister and Mr Mathieson received an invitation from Buckingham Palace to attend the Royal wedding which will take place at Westminster Abbey on Friday 29th April at 11am.

The Governor-General, Ms Quentin Bryce and her husband have also been invited.

The Prime Minister and Mr Mathieson are delighted to have been invited to the wedding which will capture the hearts of millions around the world.
